Text: The tape gives up towards the end.  I dubbed this off the original reel-to-reel on an old Revox A77.!!

If you like BLONDIE - here's a link to a mix I did of them around the same time:  (It's called Boney M again - but it IS Blondie...!)

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3679406/Boney_M_Radio_Luxembourg_Mega_Mix_1983
